Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide family (Brevinin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.22917879]Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=16 µg/ml), S. aureus (MRSA) (MIC=8 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli (MIC=128 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.22917879] It has 11.7 ± 3.2% hemolytic activity at 64 μg/mL and 88.4 ± 4.2% hemolytic activity at 128 μg/mL against rabbit red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Has antibacterial and antifungal activity. Has hemolytic activity against rabbit erythrocytes.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial peptides from the skin of the Asian frog, Odorrana jingdongensis De novo sequencing and analysis of tandem mass spectrometry data.
Literature.Author: Liu J, Jiang J, Wu Z, Xie F.
